Text:
If download stops for a while, don't worry.

Instructions:

                                                              1. Extract the files with Winrar or 7-Zip.

2. Double click the Setup.exe.

3. Install the game.

4. Copy the crack to the game directory, aka the installation folder of the  game or where the .exe for the game resides.

5. Play & Enjoy!
